name: xterrafile
description: a pure Go tool for managing vendored modules and formulas using a YAML file

scripts.gitbranch: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [[ "$BRANCH" != "master" ]]; then echo "you must be on master branch to release" >&2; exit 1 ; fi
scripts.gitstatus: STATUS=$(git status --porcelain 2>&1); echo $STATUS >&2; if [[ ! -z "$STATUS" ]]; then exit 1; fi;
